articles.author: Ciaran McGrath
articles.title: Andrew Neil thanks 'US cavalry' as fight taken to Putin over gas supply row - Daily Express
articles.description: ANDREW Neil has thanked US President Joe Biden after 15 tankers filled with natural gas were dispatched across the Atlantic to Europe to ease the escalating energy crisis - declaring: 'US cavalry to the rescue.'

articles.title: Europe's bizarre rules for Covid-19 vaccine passes - News24
articles.description: Efforts in Europe to encourage vaccine use through certificates proving vaccination, a negative test result or evidence of having had Covid have created a mountain of regulation.
articles.content:
• Going to a petrol station in Lithuania requires a Covid-19 pass.
  • The unvaccinated in Greece must produce a rapid test result to attend church.
  • Vaccine passes are required to p… [+3045 chars]
